extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Isotope Fractionation in isotope analysis and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have differentiation based on atomic properties leveraging the varying atomic properties of elements to separate them, enabling analysis of fractions for deeper understanding
extended_metaphor.isotope_fractionation: Isotope Fractionation in isotope analysis involves separating isotopes based on their atomic properties, such as mass and stability. By leveraging these differences, scientists can analyze fractions of isotopes to gain insights into geological processes or biological systems.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Similarly, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man functions by differentiating and utilizing the varying behavioral properties of elements to power the suit. By recognizing and leveraging these discrepancies, Tony Stark is able to generate energy and sustain the Iron Man suit, mirroring the way Isotope Fractionation separates isotopes for analysis.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Isotope Fractionation in isotope analysis and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have utilizing behavior discrepancies for analysis recognizing and utilizing the different behaviors exhibited by elements during natural processes to study underlying mechanisms
extended_metaphor.isotope_fractionation: Isotope analysis relies on recognizing and utilizing the different behaviors exhibited by isotopes during natural processes. By studying these discrepancies, researchers can uncover the processes involved and gain insights into environmental conditions, biological pathways, or geological events.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: In the case of the Arc Reactor in Iron Man, Tony Stark uses his knowledge of elemental behaviors to power the suit by harnessing their discrepancies in behavior. By recognizing these variations, Stark is able to control the energy output of the Arc Reactor and effectively utilize it to fuel the Iron Man suit, showcasing similarities to Isotope Fractionation in analyzing behavior for deeper understanding.
